turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I'm trying to book a restaurant for Saturday night. It's proving impossible! Can you help?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Right, sorry. I'm in Chicago. And... Italian, I think. Nothing too fancy, just good, solid Italian.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, searching for Italian restaurants in Chicago for Saturday night. I see a few options. How about 'Pasta Palazzo'? It has excellent reviews and seems to fit your description.

turns.speaker: agent
